    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1260</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Shorashim1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Shorashim1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Shorashim1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Shorashim1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Shorashim1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Shorashim1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Shorashim1</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">learners research their family history, beginning with the question: "I am Here Now, How Did I Arrive in This Particular Place?" learners interview family members</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">family history</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">family</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">shorashim</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">intervew</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lesson plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anfänger erforschen ihre Familiengeschichte und 
fangen mit der Frage an: "ich bin hier jetzt, wie ich ankam in 
diesem bestimmten Platz?" Anfängerinterview-Familie Bauteile</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">les étudiants recherchent leurs antécédents 
familiaux, commençant par la question : "je suis ici 
maintenant, comment je suis arrivé dans cet endroit particulier?" 
membres de famille d'entrevue d'étudiants</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">os learners pesquisam seu history de família, 
começando com a pergunta: "eu sou aqui agora, como eu cheguei 
neste lugar particular?" membros da família da entrevista dos 
learners</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">i principianti ricercano la loro storia di 
famiglia, cominciante con la domanda: "sono ora qui, come sono 
arrivato in questo posto particolare?" membri della famiglia di 
intervista dei principianti</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">έρευνα αρχαρίων η οικογενειακή ιστορία τους, 
αρχίζοντας με την ερώτηση: "Είμαι εδώ τώρα, πώς έφθασα σε
αυτήν την ιδιαίτερη θέση;" οι αρχάριοι παίρνουν συνέντευξη
από τα οικογενειακά μέλη</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">los principiantes investigan sus antecedentes 
familiares, comenzando con la pregunta: "ahora estoy aquí, 
cómo llegué en este lugar determinado?" miembros de la familia
de la entrevista de los principiantes</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Familiengeschichte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Familie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
